title: Ukraine's Foreign Minister Dmytro Kuleba (Extended Bonus)
description:
Ukraine’s Minister of Foreign Affairs, Dmytro Kuleba, received a standing ovation as he joined Stephen last night to give an update on his country’s war with Russia, and to share what it’s like working with his country’s brave leader, Volodymyr Zelenskey. Tune in for this Pod Show exclusive extended interview when Stephen asks what the pros & cons are of having a President with professional comedy experience.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
